name: Cowardly Crawler
description:
This game was made as an attempt by myself to learn the Godot game engine. I had it mostly complete, and decided to release as is, to move on to other projects.

You play as a cowardly hero, being forced to adventure through dungeons. Can you gain the courage to confront them and stop being harassed? Only time will tell...

The source code can be found at: https://github.com/lungdart/godot_game

If you like the game, feel free to donate some beer money through the site or with bitcoin: 1P5fGbGYWbxzik3PcRBJy83BEP2NGuiqst
